memberdef.argsstring: (mpu6050_handle_t handle, const uint8_t reg_addr, uint8_t *buffer, const uint8_t size)
memberdef.name: mpu6050_i2c_read_from

briefdescription.para: MPU6050 I2C read from register address transaction. This is a write and then read process.

parameterdescription.para: MPU6050 register address to read from.
Buffer to store results from read transaction.
Length of buffer to store results from read transaction.

memberdef.argsstring: (mpu6050_handle_t handle, const uint8_t reg_addr, uint8_t *const byte)
memberdef.name: mpu6050_i2c_read_byte_from

briefdescription.para: MPU6050 I2C read byte from register address transaction.

parameterdescription.para: MPU6050 register address to read from.

memberdef.argsstring: (mpu6050_handle_t handle, const uint8_t reg_addr, const uint8_t byte)
memberdef.name: mpu6050_i2c_write_byte_to

briefdescription.para: MPU6050 I2C write byte to register address transaction.

parameterdescription.para: MPU6050 register address to write to.
